name: Nyan Neko Sugar Republic
description:
• its technically free

I DID NOT MAKE THE ORIGINAL NYAN NEKO SUGAR GIRLS!!!

this is a fan project from someone who happened to really like the original and wanted to make a fun game out of it. funny thing is, not everyone involved actually has finished the show. check out the readme to see everyone who helped make it!

this game was made in novelty 0.8.9 which you can find here: http://www.visualnovelty.com/download.html
